item.title: Runtime_vs_compiletime
item.description:
Runtime vs. Compile Time

When I started programming, I heard a lot of these words such as: “build-time”, “compile time”, “runtime”, etc. This really confused me after some time because the names didn’t seem very intuitive to me. So I wrote the definitions of all and put them in one place in my notebook, which is what I’m gonna be sharing in this blog ðŸ˜„ . After that we’re gonna look at the difference between runtime vs compile time errors.
